resources.string: this app is just for you.. to enjoy.

Gospel Hymns and Songs 
 Special Edition 
 Designed to give a little bit of flavour to our wonderful GHS and make you like using it . 
 Use to the glory of God… 
 

 Designed By: 
 Orji Ikechukwu (jojitoon) … 
 In honour of The Glorious Generation 
 (DLCF FUTO) 2011/2012 
 Led by our Leader : Bro. Emmanuel O. 
 I love you all … 
 Also thanks to all Members of Deeper life for their support. 


 For supports and Enquiries :
 Call: 07060926994 
 Email: jojitoon@gmail.com . 
 
God Bless you
Use the search in the floating action bar to search by number \n To get the alphabetical Index sort with (A -Z) icon while the other for numerical
Use the search above at the appbar to search by any means you wish to search: title, phrases or words
Change between day and night mode \n Also to change your theme and font size of hymn.
Through the content tab you can access hymn from their content type \n. ..Enjoy
